titleStmt.title: Jehovah a free pardon, vvith many graces therein conteyned, graunted to all Christians by our most holy and reuerent father God almightie, the principal high priest and bishoppe in heauen and earth / first written in the Spanish tounge, and there published by a Spaniard vnknowen, (yet as it seemeth) the seruant of our sayde Holy Father ; and now translated into the mother English tounge, by Iohn Danyel of Clements Inne.
titleStmt.author: Danyel, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas East, for Andrew Maunsell, and are to be sould at his shop in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Parrot,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Parrot
